ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumwcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_submid | |- ( G e. Mnd -> B e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_gsumwsubmcl | |- ( ( B e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ W e. Word B ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. B ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ W e. Word B ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. B ) |
